subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 33 of 35 shots, and Dainius Zubrus scored the winning goal with 2 minutes 55 seconds left in regulation to lift the Devils over the Rangers at the Garden.
snippet: Martin Brodeur stopped 33 of 35 shots, and Dainius Zubrus scored the winning goal with 2 minutes 55 seconds left in regulation to lift the Devils over the Rangers at the Garden.
